comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Dr. Francis Landey Patton (1843-1932), born in Bermuda, Presbyterian theologian, president of Princeton University (1888-1902); different middle initial but it's clearly the same man: www.princeton.edu/pr/facts/presidents/17.htm etcweb.princeton.edu/CampusWWW/Companion/patton_francis.html

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thank you, pennylrichardsca. Will submit for review to have his middle name added to the catalog record.

comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: Princeton has a dorm building: Patton Hall, presumably named after him.
